channel.title: Reconnect Glitch
channel.description: When I left a game this morning and returned only 10 minutes later, I was greeted with the "Reconnect Button" which is standard I am well aware, but when clicked it said you were disconnected, I left and tried to join a game once more but I joined again, I then restarted the game and joined back but it still said reconnect I tried to join again about 4 times, and I then clicked it for the 6th time and instead of taking me to the game again it just kept loading for about 3 minutes and still hasn't joined I have restarted the game and It seemed to have done the trick but this was a big annoyance for about 10 minutes.

item.title: Reconnect Glitch
item.dc:creator: invoker
item.description:
When I left a game this morning and returned only 10 minutes later, I was greeted with the “Reconnect Button” which is standard I am well aware, but when clicked it said you were disconnected, I left and tried to join a game once more but I joined again, I then restarted the game and joined back but it still said reconnect I tried to join again about 4 times, and I then clicked it for the 6th time and instead of taking me to the game again it just kept loading for about 3 minutes and still hasn’t joined I have restarted the game and It seemed to have done the trick but this was a big annoyance for about 10 minutes.

Read full topic
